title: Technological Obsolescence and Populist Voting: \\ Evidence from U.S. Metropolitan AreasThis paper is a revision of APEP-0141. See https://github.com/SocialCatalystLab/auto-policy-evals/tree/main/papers/apep_0141 for the parent paper. (v6)
revision_rationale: User request - paper is too long and "a slog to read." Goal: aggressive streamlining, push robustness to appendix, focus on central message/value added, polish extensively.
